comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: My question is about the US dollar. The US borrowed $billions from the Federal Reserve Bank to give to Ukraine. Some European countries borrowed a lot of Euros from Germany for the same thing... Ukraine. What will happen when it all filters back to our respective countries? Inflation!Governments aren't going to help the people out with handouts of money that will match inflation growth. They did a little for Covid, but they won't for the Ukraine war. But if they did, it would make the inflation worse.I see hard times coming. I see the present letup as something the Dems are doing so they can get their guy in as president in 2024. And there is talk of the Reset. Think of the people that will be hurt in that.
